parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the details of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in a specific region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the maintenance window. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the HH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the maintenance window. Specify the time in the HH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.
